original_text: Jesus had not arrived in the village yet. He was still in the place where Martha had met him.
korean_text: 예수는 아직 마을로 들어오지 아니하시고 마르다가 맞이했던 곳에 그대로 계시더라

sentences.original_text: Jesus had not arrived in the village yet
He was still in the place

sentences.korean_translation: 마르다가 그분을 만났던 바로 그 장소
